website_summaries.verdict: The receiver with the belt clip is a good set for anyone who is mobile, business owners, and a wide range of other users.
pros: Portable receiver has flashing light, emits sound, and has vibrate feature to ensure that a visitor is never missed
Set also includes a plug-in receiver
Has range of chimes to choose from, including seasonal tones like Christmas music
cons: Vibration feature is perceived as weak by some users

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I needed a doorbell with blinking light and no sound for my office. I went through three different types of inexpensive wireless doorbells and each one of them gave up on me within 3 months or less. This system has been working flawlessly for more than a year already, and is still going strong. Also, I've inquired about the expansion (extra button), and got a very fast reply from Customer service. And that's precious! I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Prikhojan

customer_reviews.title: Works nicely but I can't find the way to turn off ...
customer_reviews.text: Works nicely but I can't find the way to turn off the sound at the buzzer and the battery cover of the buzzer was broken so easily, I needed to tape it up already after 2nd use.
customer_reviews.author: Ponne

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for the blind or deaf
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the blind or deaf.I bought one for a friend who is bed confined and his wife is deaf.He now has a way to reach out to her if he needs her Thanks to the flos who make this device possable.! ! !
customer_reviews.author: Richard A Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works for us as it should
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my mom to use and "buzz" for me when needed. She recently moved into my home under hospice care and needs assistance in the middle of the night with using bathroom. She keeps button next to her bed and I wear vibrating pager on my waistband at night. It has worked like a charm each time. Have not used the plug in piece of equipment because I don't have the need.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stahl

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This has worked out great for our office. My receptionist can't always be at her desk and now they can hit the doorbell and she can feel it vibrate even when she is in the mailroom. It is working great and we have 22,592 sq feet of office space and it rings anywhere she is. AWESOME
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a hard of hearing person as my husband ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a hard of hearing person as my husband is. He has no trouble hearing it, seeing it, have been searching for just this solution to a problem. Works so well in his office where he can't hear the full house doorbell. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Had it in over a month. Use it for ...
customer_reviews.text: Had it in over a month. Use it for my dad who requires 24/7 care. Works extremely well. Thank you. Update: last month the remote bell stopped working. :( The electric one still works. Not as convienient, but still useable. It lasted for almost 6 months, so in a world where everything is built to fail, this is not a shock. Other than that, nice item.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Works Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for parents who are living in and independent apartment complex. Father uses the pagers when he ois out on the balcony.
customer_reviews.author: Ronny

customer_reviews.title: Works great as caregiver's call bell
customer_reviews.text: I needed an easy way for my elderly parent to 'ring' for assistance. After a long search, I chose this model of Sado Tech specifically for the wireless button, wireless chime/vibrator receiver, and a plug-in flashing/bell receiver. I use both receivers. It works wonderfully. I now can take care of other things in the house or yard. When he needs assistance, he just hits the button (kept in his shirt pocket). I no longer have to hover, which makes us both happy! The instructions says the chime melody can be changed. I haven't bothered to try.
customer_reviews.author: Pam M.

customer_reviews.title: Vibrations loud and strong.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use as a call button for a patient in a clinic. Finally figured out I can do the lowest sound on the vibrating piece, then its just the vibration noise thats actually far louder than the chime. If you're looking for strong vibration for a hard of hearing individual, this would be great! The plug piece can do no sound as an option but it does NOT vibrate so without sound its only good for a dark place because the light on it flashes. Overall it's a little confusing to program but not hard to do. Once set up it has worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi P

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable, would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The one thing that I really needed from this product was the vibrating clip...which died about a month after receiving. It was difficult to program, and I would not suggest that anyone purchase this if they need it to work for longer than 3 weeks. Update: not even 5 months after buying the product and using it a total of 5 times the button no longer transmits. It is a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: pirate

customer_reviews.title: Great and still working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in March of 2019 because I am Deaf. It is still working and I haven't even had to change any batteries yet. The wall unit is loud enough for my daughter to hear. The buzzer works great when I am home alone and expecting someone. We stuck the button on our door and haven't had to remove it to change batteries at all in over a year. Will buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Shopgirl

customer_reviews.title: A true lifesaver.
customer_reviews.text: My son has muscular dystrophy and cannot move his hands or arms. He finds it very difficult pushing any buttons nevertheless a doorbell button. This was the best thing I ever bought for him he pushes the button and I know when he needs help instantly. The range is amazing. I can’t live without this. I buy all Sado tech products. You Should too.
customer_reviews.author: J. DiGiovanna

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for the Deaf
customer_reviews.text: I am profoundly deaf. I have always had problems in communications. A doorbell at the door is the first thing people use when they are venturing onto a new property. This ranges from salesmen, Jehova's Witnesses and delivery people, which is the most painful, as they drive off if no-one answers the door. This device will alert me to a doorbell ring from several blocks away, or more. Every deaf person should get this device.
customer_reviews.author: SteveS

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gamble because I was not sure if the transmitter would penetrate a heavy sound-proof steel door. Much to my surprise, it worked and works flawlessly. The receiver has several distinctive ring tones and classical music ring tones, and several volume levels. You can also turn off the ring tone and use only the flasher. The flasher light is rather dim, but it does work. This is a wonderful, reliable unit, and the belt clip remote is a great idea and very, very handy. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Professor Movie

customer_reviews.title: Not work right..
customer_reviews.text: Problem with vibrates after add for vibrates, both are not work a same time when bought enclosed. My husband is very frustrated and struggling.
customer_reviews.author: Christelle Woods

customer_reviews.title: Vibration is NOT strong
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased to demonstrate a doorbell system for people with hearing loss. This receiver vibrates but its just barely felt. My cell phone vibrates stronger than this. I would not recommend this product for people that are Deaf.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Ferack

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully
customer_reviews.text: This product works beautifully. Flashing light gets my attention even when bright sunshine is coming into my house from the windows. My house is about 1,000 square feet (single floor) and the unit is placed in a central location. The personal pager is very useful for when I'm in the backyard. I already had an electrical outlet at eye-level (probably intended for an electric clock), so all I had to do was plug it in. Very satisfied. I'm very hard of hearing and chimes are good for both me and hearing members of household.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew WhiteHatBear

customer_reviews.title: No lanyard
customer_reviews.text: This works great with plenty of range for the typical application. One and only complaint is the lack of a lanyard for the "patient" to wear around their neck.
customer_reviews.author: Willy Wanker

customer_reviews.title: Good product and simple to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to use for a temporary care giving situation and found it very simple to use, and suited to the purpose. Now that I no longer need it for the care giving situation, I plan to use it as a door bell.
customer_reviews.author: cherrie

customer_reviews.title: and we were not disappointed. The light flashes for a good while and ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this wireless doorbell to alert my in-laws who are deaf when there is someone at the door, and we were not disappointed. The light flashes for a good while and the clip on receiver has a strong vibration so my father in law can feel it if he is where he can not see the light flashing. This product is perfect for us .
customer_reviews.author: Gayla1

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Had to mount the receiver in a higher position than the normal height of a wall outlet. Since my mom's hearing in terrible, the visual flasher is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne K.

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Needs be louder
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for bell but could be louder. The one part clips to the shirt and vibrates so the hearing unpaired person can know someone Is ringing door. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: HEAVENS REIGN

customer_reviews.title: Finally - one that can visually alert OR auditory alert
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, prompt delivery and I was able to set up in 5 minutes. I used this in an office where I wanted a flashing alert only (no sound), so not to disturb a testing situation, but also to alert the person administering the test that someone was at the door - this was the perfect solution. This makes life a lot easier if you work in any type of therapy/assessment office, or with deaf or hard-of-hearing employees.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Mom

customer_reviews.title: Affordable solution that works as intended
customer_reviews.text: We needed a way to page staff when working out of the office. Set is working perfectly. AC receiver goes off in our house about 70 yards away from the office. Really easy to set up and connect other receivers. Customer service from this company is excellent and fast. We have purchased additional receivers, both wireless and A/C, to use with the system. It fits our needs for our small business.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works very well in our situation. We use the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well in our situation. We use the system at our pet grooming/boarding facility - staff couldn't hear the front door chime so we set this up as a 'courtesy button' for clients that come in when staff are taking care of the pets. Client presses the button and the two portables go off (we bought one extra portable), as well as the plug-in receiver unit we put in the wash bay. So, no matter where the techs are, they are aware they are needed up front!
customer_reviews.author: Dave L.

customer_reviews.title: works great. You can just use the button and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Using this in a church, works great. You can just use the button and the pager part to call someone to the nursery, if you want to. Ask me about this if you like. PS: Ordering more ,I have tried many different doorbells and this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Roger The Electrician.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, range and adaptability
customer_reviews.text: Extremely reliable doorbell products that can be adapted to many uses. Doorbell, callbell. Also operates on standard frequency that can integrate with many homegrown projects. I presonally find the belthook receiver to have the best range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good service
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for 5 months of heavy use. We use it for customer service in our farm store, open every day all day. The bell on the portable receiver stopped working, though it still vibrated. Sadotech was very responsive by email, and after a few back an forth troubleshooting emails, shipped a new receiver, even though I couldn't send the half-functional bell back as I was still relying on it. Have tried several brands over the years, this is the best so far.
customer_reviews.author: sorrel hatch

customer_reviews.title: Great for elderly mother
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product for my elderly, blind mother who can't always hear her doorbell. She can carry the vibrating ringer with her anywhere in her house. She used to leave her door open because she couldn't hear the bell. Now she's much safer. Wonderful customer service. When I had a problem with the first one I received, they quickly sent me a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: This product is one of a kind and works exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a system that has a remote pager and am pleased that this remote pager also VIBRATES. I have a very noisy work environment and this audio and vibrating notification system is exactly the right solution. The product works exactly as advertised and I recommend it for situations when you need to know if someone is coming to the door bell and you are in a noisy environment and a couple hundred feet away. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a neighbor who has trouble hearing and because it has a vibrating receiver that she can carry on her belt or in her pocket. The small receiver size (about the size of a flip-phone) is easy to keep handy and doesn't get in the way when you need both hands. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Chace

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool for paging my front of the house staff. it has a flashing light that does not make a sound. or I can do a sound as well as the flashing light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We had already been using the wireless doorbell set for 18 months in both of our kitchens with great success. Easy way to front staff to let ...
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased this set up after hiring a deaf gal to work in our kitchen. We had already been using the wireless doorbell set for 18 months in both of our kitchens with great success. Easy way to front staff to let us know they need extra service help. After purchasing this model, I did have an issue, but Josue was very communicative and replaced the plug in unit after we troubleshooted. Also purchased this for my parents!!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy G.

customer_reviews.title: Only get 1 Adhesive stickers
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Only came with one adhesive sticker for the door bell part. I am unable to use the stew to the wall option and wish I could find replacement adhesive stickers!?
customer_reviews.author: Emily-Rose Virden

customer_reviews.title: A really great buy
customer_reviews.text: My mom recently had a stroke, and at night when we're sleeping, this makes it very easy for me to wake up from the vibrations and to respond to her calling me. Just clip it to my shirt & I feel the vibrations. Setup less than 3 minutes. Comes with everything you'll need.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for those with limited vision and hearing!
customer_reviews.text: I like that this doorbell has multiple ways of getting your attention. My 85 year old mother in law has trouble hearing and seeing, so the vibration of the device gives an extra way to make sure she realizes someone is at the door. The setup was pretty easy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Honey B Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for my sick mother to call us.
customer_reviews.author: John Q Public

customer_reviews.title: We are very happy with the SadoTech Flashing Wireless Doorbell
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with the SadoTech Flashing Wireless Doorbell. We purchased for my Mom, who wears hearings aids but does not always hear somebody knocking. Now, we are thankful that she can either hear the doorbell or see it flashing. We definitely recommend this item if you are considering a doorbell for somebody hearing impaired.
customer_reviews.author: daf

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my mother-in-law who is almost completely deaf and it is great. She now knows when someone is at the door. Before this, if she was expecting someone to visit, she would leave her door unlocked and just tell them to come right in. Since she lives alone out in the country we didn't think this was safe. This has given us peace of mind and she is very happy with it also.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S.

customer_reviews.title: Helps my mom know when someone is ringing her doorbell ...
customer_reviews.text: Helps my mom know when someone is ringing her doorbell if she falls asleep or isn't wearing her hearing aids.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: So far very good product, we use it as a paper for ...
customer_reviews.text: So far very good product, we use it as a pager for my wife when I'm out in the yard or in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas F.

customer_reviews.title: Does what I needed it to
customer_reviews.text: Got this so my wife could alert me in the basement when she needed me, works fine
customer_reviews.author: danpaul

customer_reviews.title: Hear, feel and see the doorbell ring!
customer_reviews.text: My mom who is 90 has a way to hear and feel the doorbell! No more missed visits from friends or the home healtj nurse!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie A.

customer_reviews.title: Just what my hard of hearing husband needed!
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this doorbell. The chime is loud and the flashing light really gets my husband's attention.
customer_reviews.author: Steve & Patty

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my mother that is too stubborn to get hearing aids. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great little doorbell
customer_reviews.text: A great doorbell. I love the different sounds, especially the Christmas music! So easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Shinyhalo

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Well designed, works well. Setup is straightforward. Not using it as a doorbell but as a calling button for a person who is bed bound. The buzzer is quite handy to carry around and still remain available to be called.
customer_reviews.author: MarcV

customer_reviews.title: Great assist.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Using it for a call system for an ill person. The portable device adds outdoor flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: William E Haines

customer_reviews.title: Great product, I don't particularly use the plug in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product , I don't particularly use the plug in lights, it's not bright enough to Alert a deaf person, I use the portable reciever Alone that vibrates when doorbell has rung. If the company is considering some improvement,I would suggest strobing light on the plug in reciever. Light flashes on the portable. Would also have been neat so I don't have to wear it all the time :)
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Great for elderly people
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my elderly parents to use as a means of getting my Dads attention when my Mother needs him. He has poor hearing and when he is in a different room he can’t hear her call him. Now all she has to do is push a button and he can hear the chime. When he is outside he wears the clip on alarm and it works perfectly to get his attention. This is just what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Twila Reynaud

customer_reviews.title: Loud enough for me
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and nice variety of chimes and has good volume. Different alerts very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Spock

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Used this for emergency notification in our church nursery. Works perfectly. Strobe is plugged in near our sound booth and one of us carries the pager. Exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Rick N

customer_reviews.title: This doorbell works awesome for the Law Firm that I work for
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell works awesome for the Law Firm that I work for. I am the customer relations person at my job and always mobile. When a client comes to my desk and I am not there, they ring the bell. Great range distance as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Light Up
customer_reviews.text: This is a good item lets me know someone is at the door with the flashing blue light
customer_reviews.author: NETTIE

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: we bought this for our business, so customers could call for assistance. when worn on the belt the receiver vibrates and chimes when a customer presses the doorbell button. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I am using it as a pager for waitressing. Vibration could be a bit stronger but the distance is good.
customer_reviews.author: Zander

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I haven't put it to use yet, but I'm impressed with the different volume levels and chime choices. This seems like a good product for a good price
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: It is a wonderful way for a caregiver to be summoned
customer_reviews.text: We received yesterday. It is a wonderful way for a caregiver to be summoned. At this point I hope it has a long battery life and a long life in general. I will report back.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Flashing
customer_reviews.text: I am hard of hearing and it works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Janssen

customer_reviews.title: Works just like advertised and has excellent range along with great volume
customer_reviews.text: We have found this unit to be very functional. Works just like advertised and has excellent range along with great volume.
customer_reviews.author: Marhaus33

customer_reviews.title: Works just as described
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell was just what we needed for Dad who is deaf. Now friends and service workers can stop by and work on his place and he's not stuck waiting beside the door for them. Convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Homeowner

customer_reviews.title: So far have work wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My niece is deaf and my brother is incapacitated, They are using the wireless doorbell so he can call on her in a case of a need or accident. So far have work wonderful
customer_reviews.author: MPG

customer_reviews.title: A great Door Bell with many uses
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in my neighbors house because his dog sits by my fence and barks all night. Now when that dog barks I just press the button and the flashing light and door bell sound wakes him up and he can shout "SHUT UP" out his window, which wakes up the neighbors on the other side of his house and they call animal control. Then he gets a citation which results in him keeping the dog in his house at night for a few days and blames it on the other neighbor instead of me. works great, I couldn't be more happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful tool for caregivers!
customer_reviews.text: Great for caregivers! We are using it for my mother-in-law to ring when she needs to get up. We can hear all through the house, especially during the night. The vibrating clip-on is great for working in the yard and you can't hear the bell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... and repair the transmitter and now it is working great! Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had a little problem with the transmitter not working but I wrote the company and they got back to me immediately and gave me some hints on how to reset and repair the transmitter and now it is working great! Good customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Good Shepherd P C A

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative for nurse call
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to install and loud enough you can hear it down the hall. We are using it as an alarm for help in our public restroom in our assisted living facility.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This item is so awesome for some one that's hearing impaired and deaf .
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Crain

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Works for our purpose. Can't figure out how to set the portable receiver to vibrate only, with no chime noises. Other than that, I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ANSWER THE DOOR
customer_reviews.text: Electronic device that's finally available & long overdue for the non-hearing population.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried it at a distance but so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly what was described in the listing. It made it so easy to purchase and the same day delivery was right on point.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Lopez

customer_reviews.title: LIKED IT, BUT IT BROKE
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product at first. It was just what I needed to help care for my invalid wife. But after about a week the belt clip broke so I carried it in my pocket - still worked. Then after about six weeks it quit working altogether. I replaced all the batteries, but still doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Ricks

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect fit for my door bell needs! The bell plugs into AC outlet close to me 80-100 feet away and has chime, chime with flash or flash only setting. The clip on rides with my staff and rings twice and vibrates about 8-10 times giving you time to realize it's vibrating. Thank you! Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ppatterson

customer_reviews.title: Never purchase this item! You will regret it!
customer_reviews.text: Failed unit out of the box, Sadotech refused to replace the failed item. Never purchase Sadotech products.
customer_reviews.author: William Little

customer_reviews.title: So so.
customer_reviews.text: If you think you will feel the vibrating alert, think again. So if you counting on the portable unit's vibration, it is VERY WEAK! I purchased two of these devices, the plug in doorbell / flashing units are loud and bright. They are fine. I am disappointed in both portable devices. They just don't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Frankn

customer_reviews.title: ... of this product didn't work and I didn't feel like going through all the hassle of returning this product ...
customer_reviews.text: The bigger part of this product didn't work and I didn't feel like going through all the hassle of returning this product it was around Christmas time and I was going to use it as a gift
customer_reviews.author: mark e

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit.
customer_reviews.text: Profoundly Deaf. Hoped to use as a pager for invalid family member. Out of the box, vibrations not as strong as I would have liked. Plug in receiver had a dim blue light, which was on constantly, blinked when button pressed. After 24 hours, plug in unit was dead, no light, nothing. i would not recommend this unit for those depending on light or vibrations. No idea how the audible alarm performs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save you time and money and look for something better.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very cheaply made. It did not work when I received​ it and I am returning it. Save you time and money and look for something better.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a month and a half. Asked company for a replacement with no response. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

product_meta.title: Wireless Caregiver Call Button System - Medical Alert System for Seniors & Elderly Care - Caregiver Pagers and Beepers w/Flashing LED for Hearing Impaired, Belt Clip, Vibrating Receiver, Transmitter
feature_bullets: AS SEEN ON BUSINESS INSIDER, FOX, ABC, NBC & CBS News - "It's built well, and it has a nice minimalist style" - Business Insider, 08/21/15. Our doorbells are great looking, loud, and reliable.
NEED SPARE BATTERIES, extra add-on buttons, receivers, sensors or a CUSTOMIZED DOORBELL button? …Check it out here ➔ www.amazon.com/sadotech

TAKE CARE OF YOUR FAMILY - The ultimate call bell for your loved ones so they can immediately send a panic button alert whenever they need assistance! Award winning alarm system and doorbell that was designed for ASSISTED LIVING and SPECIAL NEEDS.

PORTABLE DEVICE - The life alert buzzer button transmitter is portable. You can put it in your pocket or hang it around your belt. It sends a wireless signal to EITHER OR BOTH the plugin receiver and/or the vibrating receiver.
EASY INSTALLATION - The life alert systems for seniors is simple to set up in minutes and will quickly notify caregivers when assistance is needed.

MULTIPLE ALERT OPTIONS - The caregiver pager elderly monitor has 32 different melodies/chimes to choose from with 4 adjustable volume levels. You can also put it on silent mode and just have it vibrate. The bright LED alert light is also great for those with hearing impairment.
VARIOUS USES - This wireless bell is also a great tool for BUSINESS and STORE OWNERS working in NOISY ENVIRONMENTS by using the VIBRATING RECEIVER (with belt clip).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars147 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
